summary: Allows werewolves to cannibalize corpses while in human form, uses Brevi\'s Tales of Lycanthropy
descriptionHtml:
Just a simple tweak I originally did for personal use, there are three versions planned, one available:

- One for Tales of Lycanthropy
X One for Vanilla Skyrim
X And one for Tales of Lycanthropy that removes the regen buff I had added

 I\'ll also update for Dawnguard compatibility when it comes out for the PC.

Changes:

- Re-names both effects of \"Namira\'s Blessing\"
- Added Cannibalism to werewolves in human form
- Added a small health regen buff to werewolves in human form

Installation:

- Install Tales of Lycanthropy
- Use Lycanthropy_Main_Cannibalism.esp instead of Lycanthropy_by_Brevi.esp

Known Issues:

- The script that adds the Cannibalism perk is tied to the Companions quests, so existing werewolves may or may not be able to cannibalize people in human form. Once I find a less intrusive way of adding the cannibalism perk to werewolves I\'ll post an update.

Let me know if you have any issues,
author: Kassus
